title: Intelligent Air Quality Monitoring SystemFont
meta description:
Wuchieh and XiaoXiang_Meow Co-development and bridging API
    金魚#2373 assist in front-end layout design
    揮舞熊掌劃破天際的思特#4958 provide Google Map API interface
learn1: Scan QR CODE to join our robots
learn2: Get your UUID (you need to register your account with it)
learn3: Open the website and register for an account
learn5: Search for the location you want to observe
learn6: You can customize the name of the coordinates (this is the example of Zhongli Railway Station)
learn7: GPS can also be used to locate the current coordinates
learn9: This page allows you to set the distance to be observed and how often you need to be notified.
learn10: Periodically reports current air quality conditions based on when and where you set notifications
learn10sm: The Chung Cheng Memorial Hall will not have any information because there are no sensors near it, so it will report no information.
learn11: If there is a coordinate that you want to delete, click the Delete button to delete it.
learnTitle3: Here is a tutorial on setting up LINE robots
learn13: Click on the coordinates to add new coordinates (login required)
learn14: Back to Settings There is a notification time next to the coordinates Click to set how often you want to be notified
inputLengthLt8: Account or password length is less than 8
networkError: Please try again later if there is a problem with the network
noInput: Please enter your username and password
selectLocation: Please select the location you want to modify
locationsMaximum: The number of locations has reached on
confirmDeleteModal: Do you want to delete the
lineForLineError: This Line is linked to other accounts.
